meanings.definition: A type of shrub or small tree with yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The caragana in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant color of caragana flowers.
meanings.sent3: The caragana bush waved happily in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of caragana in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The caragana bush stood out like a golden beacon in the landscape.

meanings.definition: The bright yellow flowers of the caragana plant.
meanings.sent1: The caragana brightened up the whole garden.
meanings.sent2: The sweet scent of caragana filled the air.
meanings.sent3: The caragana flowers seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bouquet of caragana blossoms.
meanings.sent5: The caragana blooms shone like drops of sunshine on the plant.

meanings.definition: The seeds of the caragana plant.
meanings.sent1: The caragana seeds were scattered by the wind.
meanings.sent2: I planted caragana seeds in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The caragana seeds rolled playfully down the hill.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread like caragana seeds in fertile ground.
meanings.sent5: The caragana seeds held the promise of new life in the garden.
